entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
